description.narrative: 308/003 Populations build resilience and receive life & livelihood saving relief and recovery response to health emergencies in accordance with CCCs, which contributes to Child Health, Health And Emergencies. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 308 Government, communities &civil societies in Disaster Risk Reduction (including timely life saving interventions during emergencies) respond to emergencies in Ethiopia by 2015, with particular focus on issues affecting women & children in the most vulnerable regions/districts.
